title: What exactly is Node.js?
text: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment. Sounds great, but what does that mean? How does that work? The Node run-time environment includes everything you need to execute a program written in JavaScript...

title: Web Components without a framework: Let’s build a Modal!
text: How to make a modal component from scratch using vanilla JavaScript. In this post, I will give you a quick overview of what are web components and why are they useful. I will also guide you through the process of making a modal web component from scratch without any framework to better understand its working...
